block.p: A report by Agence France-Presse in the ''Arts, Briefly'' column on Tuesday about the Rolling Stones' performance at the Isle of Wight Festival on Sunday night referred incorrectly at one point to the history of their appearances in Britain. As the report noted elsewhere, their performance at the Isle of Wight was their first at a British music festival since 1976. It was not their first in Britain since then.

A report by Agence France-Presse in the ''Arts, Briefly'' column on Tuesday about the Rolling Stones' performance at the Isle of Wight Festival on Sunday night referred incorrectly at one point to the history of their appearances in Britain. As the report noted elsewhere, their performance at the Isle of Wight was their first at a British music festival since 1976. It was not their first in Britain since then.
